column4: hey guys.. im running a windows OS virtualized on linux, which uses an iscsi block device for the windows box's disk. Under average load i see slower performance of the windows box - i'm guessing this is because the iscsi is slowing or hitting threashold issues
any tips?  ive setup 2 x gigabit in a bonded mode 0 to the iscsi san
in a terminal, try rdesktop -u [user] [windows IP] <-- see if that is slow too
